title: "About Japan.R"

## What is Japan.R?
Japan.R is an anual conference of R, a statistical softfare. In this conference, the organizers and participants of local communities of R get together. There are many local communities in Japan:

- [Fukuoka.R](https://www.facebook.com/fukuoka.stat.R)
- [HiRosima.R(HijiyamaR)](https://hiroshimar.connpass.com/)
- [Kashiwa.R](https://www14.atwiki.jp/kashiwar/)
- [Kobe.R](https://kobexr.doorkeeper.jp/)
- [Nagoya.R](https://atnd.org/events/78674)
- [Okinawa.R](http://www.okadajp.org/RWiki/?%E6%B2%96%E7%B8%84R%E5%90%8C%E5%A5%BD%E4%BC%9A)
- [Osaka.R](https://sites.google.com/site/osakarwiki/)
- [SappoRo.R](http://kokucheese.com/event/index/423714/)
- [Shiga.R](https://atnd.org/events/5939)
- [Tokyo.R](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/r-study-tokyo)
- [Tsukuba.R](http://seesaawiki.jp/w/syou6162/)
- [Yamadai.R](https://atnd.org/events/37336)
